altername_name: SuperLite 1500 Series: Ano Ko Doko no Ko: Endless Season
name: Ano Ko Doko no Ko: Endless Season
overview: In simulation game "Ano Ko Doko no Ko: Endless Season", you have to befriend and become lovers with a girl within the given time. In single-play story mode, you have to meet, befriend and become lover with a girl, then overcome various challenges to obtain happiness within six months. Even after a successful confession, you may have to overcome all kinds of ordeal and find your own happy ending.
